meanings.definition: Near the beginning of a period of time.
meanings.sent1: She arrived early for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: He always wakes up early in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The early bird catches the worm, they say!
meanings.sent4: Getting an early start can lead to success.
meanings.sent5: Being early is better than being late.

meanings.definition: Before the usual or expected time.
meanings.sent1: The bus arrived early at the bus stop.
meanings.sent2: They finished their work early today.
meanings.sent3: He was so early that he beat the sunrise!
meanings.sent4: Leaving early can avoid traffic jams.
meanings.sent5: Arriving early gives you time to relax.

meanings.definition: At or near the beginning of the day.
meanings.sent1: The bakery opens early to serve fresh bread.
meanings.sent2: She likes to exercise early in the morning.
meanings.sent3: Waking up early is tough but rewarding.
meanings.sent4: The early morning mist covered the fields.
meanings.sent5: Early risers enjoy the peaceful morning.

meanings.definition: In good time; before the usual or expected time.
meanings.sent1: He completed the project early and impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: She finished her homework early and had time to play.
meanings.sent3: The early delivery saved the day!
meanings.sent4: Arriving early for the flight reduced stress.
meanings.sent5: Paying bills early avoids late fees.
